## Usethis setup

```{r dev-setup}
path <- rprojroot::find_root(".git/index")
usethis::proj_set(file.path(path, "rktest"), force = TRUE)
usethis::proj_sitrep()
```

## Reticulate config

```{r dev-reticulate}
# create virtualenv
reticulate::virtualenv_create("ktest")
# activate python environment
reticulate::use_virtualenv(virtualenv = "ktest", required = TRUE)
# install Python package (to do once)
reticulate::virtualenv_install(
    envname = "ktest",
    packages = "pyktest @ git+https://github.com/AnthoOzier/ktest@main#subdirectory=pyktest"
)
# check Python config
reticulate::py_discover_config()
```

## Package development

### Initialization (to be run once)

```{r dev-init}
# create package template
usethis::create_package("rktest", rstudio = FALSE, open = FALSE)
# use Rmd for README generation
usethis::use_readme_rmd()
# package-level documentation
usethis::use_package_doc()
# additional files/folders to ignore during build
usethis::use_build_ignore("dev")
```

### Documentation

```{r dev-doc}
# Simulate package installation
pkgload::load_all("rktest")

# Generate documentation and deal with dependencies
attachment::att_amend_desc(path = file.path(path, "rktest"))

# README file
devtools::build_readme("rktest")
```

### Test and check

```{r development-check}
# Run the test
devtools::test("rktest")

# test coverage
covr::package_coverage(
    "rktest", line_exclusions = list("R/init.R", "R/python.R"))

# Check the package
devtools::check("rktest")
```
